text_block_list.text: One, two… three, four… one, two…
text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O

text_block_list.text:
Whew… it seems we're finally beginning to synchronise. 
Shall we call it here for the day?
text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan

text_block_list.text: How did you feel about today's dance?
text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan

text_block_list.text: Huh?! Y-Your dance was lovely as usual, Ardan-san! Your steps were flawless, and you were conscious of everything down to the tips of your fingers!
text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O

text_block_list.text: But on the other hand I'm just kind of, like, mediocre, or like… there's nothing really showy about me.
text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O

text_block_list.text: It made me think, I've gotta work even harder! I'm pretty average, so I just have to push myself to aim even higher!
text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O

text_block_list.text: Hehe… then allow me as your date to help you in any way I can.
text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan

text_block_list.text: Oh! Thanks so much, Ardan-san!
text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O

text_block_list.text: G-Good day, my reliable upperclassmen! Could you so kindly show me video footage of your dance practice?!
text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O

text_block_list.text: (And so I went to ask Ardan-san's classmates and the upperclassmen in my dorm for all the footage of their past Dorowa dances!)
text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O

text_block_list.text: (After all, I'm aiming for the Best Date! I may be average, but that just means I've got to put in every average ounce of effort that I can!)
text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O

text_block_list.text: (To stand out from everyone else on that day, I'll do all the research I can—)
text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O

text_block_list.text: …One day, I'll wear the same crown too…
text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O

text_block_list.text: The more I go through old footage of dances, the clearer it becomes that Maruzen-san's dance on that day was on another level.
text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O

text_block_list.text: They constantly passed the lead back and forth, neither falling into a "supporting" role. It was a bold move, and a testament to their skill that they kept their balance.
text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O

text_block_list.text: It was truly a captivating, special dance of Maruzen-san's own. She didn't let herself be constrained by what's "ordinary" or what came before.
text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O

text_block_list.text: Oh, Chiyono O-san! How are things? Is your dress coming along well?
text_block_list.name: Nice Nature

text_block_list.text: Ah… Y-Yes, it is. Are you here on committee business again, Nature-san?
text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O

text_block_list.text: I sure am. By the by, you haven't seen McQueen, have you? The committee's got a request for her…
text_block_list.name: Nice Nature

text_block_list.text: Chiyono O-san! They said the dress you ordered the other day has finally arrived at the estate.
text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan

text_block_list.text: So, how do you feel about doing some reconnaissance while trying the dress on? It seems that McQueen will be practicing her couple dance at the estate, as well.
text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan

text_block_list.text: Sounds great! What about you, Nature-san? You needed to talk to McQueen-san about something, right?
text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O

text_block_list.text: U-Uh, yeah, that's right! Hope you don't mind me tagging along, then.
text_block_list.name: Nice Nature

text_block_list.text: I'll go grab my bag real quick from the classroom! Let's meet at the school gates in ten minutes!
text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O

text_block_list.text: Alri… ght.
text_block_list.name: Nice Nature

text_block_list.text: …If McQueen's practicing, then she's going to be there too, huh.
text_block_list.name: Nice Nature

text_block_list.text: Ahaha… so you and Ardan-san are aiming for Best Date, correct?
text_block_list.name: Nice Nature

text_block_list.text: Yes! I've gathered a ton of footage to study, too! Whoever we trade blows with, we're not gonna lose!
text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O

text_block_list.text: "Trade blows"? This isn't some sort of down-and-dirty fight, you know.
text_block_list.name: Nice Nature

text_block_list.text: It's not a bad way to prepare ourselves, however. McQueen and her date, who we'll shortly be observing, are also aiming for Best Date this year.
text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan

text_block_list.text: Because they're our rivals.
text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan

text_block_list.text: That's right, Ardan-san! No matter who comes at us, I'll——
text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O

text_block_list.text: Teio-san!
Ahaha! Don't get distracted now, McQueen! You can… keep up with me, can't you?
text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio

text_block_list.text: Hmph, of course! It's time for the next turn!
text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen

text_block_list.text: Heck yeah! This is awesome! ♪ Okay, one more time! Last one—! ♪
text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio

text_block_list.text: Woah, they're already pros at it. Seriously… McQueen's insanely good.
text_block_list.name: Nice Nature

text_block_list.text: …Teio, too.
text_block_list.name: Nice Nature

text_block_list.text: (Oh, wow… they're amazing. Their sharp turns, their deft movements… compared to them, I'm just…)
text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O

text_block_list.text: (These two… aren't "ordinary" at all.)
text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O

text_block_list.text: Whew… ahh, I'm pooped! That suit's way too stuffy! Wait, huh? Nature? Uwah, what're you doing here?!
text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio

text_block_list.text: Ah, well, y'see, the Dorowa committee has some business with McQueen here, so…
text_block_list.name: Nice Nature

text_block_list.text: Oh, might this be about volunteering? I see they've decided on the lesson schedule for the applicants, then.
text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen

text_block_list.text: …Lessons? You mean McQueen's gonna teach everyone else at school, too?
text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O

text_block_list.text: Ha… ahahah…
text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O

text_block_list.text: (I thought I'd learn a bunch of different dances from the recordings. But seeing it in person, the intensity is totally different. It shattered all my expectations.)
text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O

text_block_list.text: (If I can't win against these two, I can't win Best Date. Some dark, heavy feeling's punched a deep, deep hole in my chest…)
text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
